snippet: Over the past several seasons, love has shadowed hate as the common reaction to prints, a trend that many designers link to a yearning for better and simpler times; prints, they suggest, make you happier than solids.
abstract: Over the past several seasons, love has shadowed hate as the common reaction to prints, a trend that many designers link to a yearning for better and simpler times; prints, they suggest, make you happier than solids.

headline.main: Behavior Pattern | The Psychology Behind Fashion's Latest Favorite
